Notes.Text:
This update for libmatroska, mkvtoolnix fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-4022: Fixed use-after-free vulnerability that existed in the way MKV (matroska) file format was handled (bsc#1113709).
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15
SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way MKVToolNix MKVINFO v25.0.0 handles the MKV (matroska) file format. A specially crafted MKV file can cause arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user.
